News.Title: Laxmi Goldorna House Schedules Board Meeting for Bonus and Fundraising Discussion
News.Summary: Laxmi Goldorna House has scheduled a board meeting on September 4 to discuss bonus distribution and fundraising matters. The meeting will focus on these two key agenda items that could impact shareholders and the company's capital structure.

News.Title: Laxmi Goldorna House Approves Amalgamation with Laxmi Infraspace
News.Summary: Laxmi Goldorna House has announced the approval of a scheme of amalgamation with Laxmi Infraspace. This corporate action involves the merging of Laxmi Infraspace into Laxmi Goldorna House.
